attributes.action: Anti - Drivers of disabled Scooters to be registered and made accountable for dangerous driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposal isn't very well thought out, for a great many disabled people an electronic scooter is the only method of mobility, it gives them freedom to go out, shop and do things that otherwise they wouldn't be able to do.  At the moment Mobility Scooters are free for shopping purposes in Most Towns and Cities, if the proposed legislation is put in place I think that this freedom will be taken away.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Petitions should be phrased to comment on government policy, not on other petitions.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
